definitions.definition: The region of the mammalian body between the neck and abdomen as well as the cavity containing the heart and lungs .
The middle of three distinct divisions in an insect , crustacean or arachnid body to which the legs are attached.

main_definition: ( anatomy ) The region of the mammalian body between the neck and abdomen as well as the cavity containing the heart and lungs .
secondary_definitions: ( entomology and arachnology ) The middle of three distinct divisions in an insect , crustacean or arachnid body to which the legs are attached.
